name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase ~Curious Queen~
name_original: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase ~Curious Queen~
description:
Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase ~Curious Queen~ is an adventure game. It came out on 29-10-2020.
You can play Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase ~Curious Queen~ on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. The game is sold via PlayStation Store.
